comment.author: 67433042@N03
comment._content: I write a blog that sometimes deals with helping men take good photos for online profiles, and I was looking for an interesting picture that demonstrated 'thinking out of the box' while taking photos. I really love this pic, but don't know if there are rules against using it publicly at www.online-dating-mastery.com/online-dating-pictures-show.... If so, I can definitely give photo credit. Thank you--JT

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi jtp0198,

There are not any copyright restrictions on this photo, so you are free to use it.  We do appreciate photo credit though!

Thanks,

Mary 
U.S. National Archives
